name: nl-at-eof
author: Johan Sundstr√∂m <oyasumi@gmail.com>
description: Appends a newline at EOF / truncates off superfluous ones

scripts.test: rm -rf tests/actual ; cp -rp tests/input tests/actual ; ./nl-at-eof tests/actual/* | sort -n > tests/actual/stdout ; diff -r tests/actual tests/expected
